message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled performance and value. We believe its worth far exceeds $12000, but I understand everyone has their own valuation. To make this opportunity accessible, I'm offering it to you for $15000. This price reflects not only the cost of production and development but also the unique benefits and features that set this product apart. I trust it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
